  • PREVIEW: SOUTHAMPTON VS. CRYSTAL PALACE - PREDICTION, TEAM NEWS, LINEUPS

    https://www.sportsmole.co.uk/football/southampton/relegation-battle/preview/preview-southampton-vs-crystal-palace-prediction-team-news-lineups_511271.html

    04/13/2023, 19:07

    70.0% Shortened!

    With both sides at opposite ends of the nine-team Premier League relegation dogfight, Southampton host a revitalised Crystal Palace at St Mary's on Saturday afternoon

    Such a statistic is hardly reassuring against a Crystal Palace side who have suddenly found their shooting boots, and Southampton could lose 10 Premier League home games in a single season for just the third time

    © Reuters No Wilfried Zaha? No problem for Crystal Palace, and in particular Michael Olise, who wrote his name into the Premier League's history books with an exemplary playmaking performance to subject Leeds to an Elland Road trouncing

    Becoming the youngest player in Premier League history to set up three goals from open play in a single game, Olise pulled the strings as Palace fought back from Patrick Bamford's opener with a glut of goals from Jordan Ayew (2), Eberechi Eze, Marc Guehi and Odsonne Edouard

    Safety is far from assured for the Eagles, but there should be no concerns on the survival front if they can maintain their astounding attacking form, and Hodgson was the man in the dugout when Palace last won three Premier League games in a row in 2019-20

    James Ward-Prowse was up to his usual free-kick tricks when Southampton beat Palace 2-1 in January's FA Cup third-round match, but the Eagles are unbeaten in three Premier League games against the Saints and are out to record back-to-back wins at St Mary's for the first time ever

    ['premier', 'league', 'southampton', 'palace', 'saint']

  • HONG SENG REMAINS KEEN ON EV BATTERY MANUFACTURING PROJECT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/04/13/hong-seng-remains-keen-on-ev-battery-manufacturing-project

    04/13/2023, 18:10

    50.0% Shortened!

    Despite the termination, Hong Seng remained keen on the electrification revolution by choosing to focus on its electric vehicle (EV) batteries manufacturing project (Project Volt) in collaboration with EoCell Inc (USA)

    Hong Seng had on Feb 13 announced its intention to acquire AEV for the purposes of acquiring the 55 acres Tanjung Malim Land held by AEV as well as AEV’s EV business which may complement its Project Volt initiative

    The acquisition is subjected to conditions precedent of the SSA which included amongst others a feasibility study to be carried out by Hong Seng to assess the suitability of the Tanjung Malim Land for the purpose of Project Volt

    Chin said Hong Seng would ensure that its plans are implemented cautiously in compliance with the stringent standards and requirements for batteries manufacturing and its related industries even if it will take a longer period of time to determine a suitable land and location

    Riding on the positive global outlook of the global EV battery market, which is projected to reach US$134.6bil by 2027, the group remained committed to make Project Volt a success with much-needed support from the government

    “Hong Seng aims to be one of the best EV battery manufacturers given EoCell’s proprietary technology which achieved disruptive breakthroughs for EV batteries in Silicon-based anode and non-flammable electrolyte.”

    ['hong', 'seng', 'battery', 'project', 'volt']

    Despite the termination, Hong Seng remained keen on the electrification revolution by choosing to focus on its electric vehicle (EV) batteries manufacturing project (Project Volt) in collaboration with EoCell Inc (USA)

    Hong Seng had on Feb 13 announced its intention to acquire AEV for the purposes of acquiring the 55 acres Tanjung Malim Land held by AEV as well as AEV’s EV business which may complement its Project Volt initiative

    The acquisition is subjected to conditions precedent of the SSA which included amongst others a feasibility study to be carried out by Hong Seng to assess the suitability of the Tanjung Malim Land for the purpose of Project Volt

    Chin said Hong Seng would ensure that its plans are implemented cautiously in compliance with the stringent standards and requirements for batteries manufacturing and its related industries even if it will take a longer period of time to determine a suitable land and location

    Riding on the positive global outlook of the global EV battery market, which is projected to reach US$134.6bil by 2027, the group remained committed to make Project Volt a success with much-needed support from the government

    “Hong Seng aims to be one of the best EV battery manufacturers given EoCell’s proprietary technology which achieved disruptive breakthroughs for EV batteries in Silicon-based anode and non-flammable electrolyte.”

    ['hong', 'seng', 'battery', 'project', 'volt']

    The Saudis set oil production levels in coordination with Russia

    Geopolitical Frictions For decades, the US-Saudi “oil for security” pact has been a pillar of the energy market

    OPEC+ Budget Needs Oil producers, meanwhile, have their own objectives

    Saudi oil is cheap to extract

    To meet all these goals, the kingdom needs an oil price closer to $100

    China buys significant volumes of Russian and Iranian oil at a discount — partially shielding it from the price hike

    The benchmark FBM KLCI closed down 0.52 points at 1,434.22 after moving between 1,435.01 and 1,430.89 throughout the day

    Among the losers on Bursa Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur Kepong eased 24 nsen to RM21.66, Amtel Holdings fell 24 sen to 70 sen, F&N declined 20 sen to RM27 and Shangri-La Hotels slid 12 sen to RM2.98

    BLD Plantation jumped 98 sen to RM11, Nestle rose 50 sen to RM136.90, Malaysian Pacific Industries added 42 sen to RM29.30 and Chin Hin gained 36 sen to RM4.79

    MyEG, the most active counter on Bursa Malaysia, rose 10.5 sen to 87.5 sen with 324.19 million shares traded

    On Jan 31, this year, the High Court allowed the prosecution's appeal and imposed a six-month jail term

    Mohamad then filed an application to the Court of Appeal seeking leave to appeal against his sentence

    Under the law, Mohamad must first obtain leave from the Court of Appeal before he can proceed with the appeal as his case originated from the Magistrate's Court

    04/13/2023, 18:07

    People take part in mass water fights during the first day of Songkran, or Thai New Year, on Khao San Road in Bangkok on Apr 13, 2023

    "It's a multiple-day, city-wide water fight," said Jared Baumeister, a lawyer from New York, who flew into Bangkok this week to join the festivities

    "I don't know where else in the world you'd get this," he said while holding a multi-coloured water gun and sipping a beer

    Thailand beat its target of 6 million tourist arrivals in the first quarter, recording 6.15 million visitors between January and late March, according to government data

    At least 30 million tourists are expected to visit Thailand this year and spend 1.5 trillion baht (US$43.74 billion), according to projections by the Tourism Council, an industry body

  • TAX ARREARS: LAWYER SHAFEE FAILS TO OBTAIN LEAVE TO FILE COUNTERCLAIM

    https://www.thesundaily.my/home/tax-arrears-lawyer-shafee-fails-to-obtain-leave-to-file-counterclaim-PP10866898

    04/13/2023

    62.5% Shortened!

    She said that Muhammad Shafee’s claim that tax assessments were “concocted mala fide” by MACC and the AGC can be dealt with another avenue

    “There may be appeals before SCIT but payments must be made or become debts due to the IRB of which they are legally empowered to collect the tax arrears,” she said adding that Muhammad Shafee was not the first taxpayer who wished to file a counterclaim in these types of proceedings

    Meanwhile, the court fixed July 26 to hear summary judgment by the IRB on behalf of the government against Muhammad Shafee

    Following the statement to the MACC, Muhammad Shafee alleged that a meeting was held in September 2018 among the IRB, the MACC and AGC to discuss a plan of action to oppress and persecute him with the aim of discouraging him from acting as Najib’s counsel

    On Sept 27, 2021, IRB requested that the suit against Muhammad Shafee be decided through summary judgement on the grounds that the defendant failed to pay the entire income tax arrears and the tax increase imposed on him amounting to RM9,414,708.32 within the stipulated period

    Muhammad Shafee was represented by Datuk Seri Rajan Navaratnam and Muhammad Farhan Muhammad Shafee while IRB senior counsels Al-Hummidallah Idrus, Norzilah Abdul Hamid and Muhammad Faqrol Syazreen Mohd Ghause acted for the IRB

  • COUNTRY HEIGHTS SAYS UNAFFECTED BY BANKRUPTCY ORDER AGAINST FOUNDER LEE KIM YEW

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/country-heights-says-unaffected-by-bankruptcy-order-against-founder-lee-kim-yew/64644

    04/13/2023, 17:09

    57.14% Shortened!

    News emerged yesterday that Lee was the subject of a bankruptcy order issued earlier this year, before he stepped down as the chairman of CHHB

    At a press conference earlier today, Lee insisted he was still “solidly solvent” despite the Adjudication Order and Receiving Order (AORO) declaring him bankrupt by the High Court in January

    The former consultant, Gerald Patrick Healy, is a US citizen with a legal background and a former officer of Lee’s US-based Club Excellence Inc, which has since wound up

    Following the winding-up of the company, Lee said Healy sought an arbitration order against him without his presence due to existing Covid-19 travel restrictions at that time

    Lee said Healy later obtained a judgment in the latter’s favour, who then used Malaysian bankruptcy law and the US court order to make him a bankrupt

    He insisted he never chose to be a bankrupt or intended to file for bankruptcy, claiming the dispute between him and Healy was a “dirty trick” the consultant used to personally attack him as both men were once friends.

    ['chhb', 'say', 'lee', 'bankrupt', 'order']

    News emerged yesterday that Lee was the subject of a bankruptcy order issued earlier this year, before he stepped down as the chairman of CHHB

    At a press conference earlier today, Lee insisted he was still “solidly solvent” despite the Adjudication Order and Receiving Order (AORO) declaring him bankrupt by the High Court in January

    The former consultant, Gerald Patrick Healy, is a US citizen with a legal background and a former officer of Lee’s US-based Club Excellence Inc, which has since wound up

    Following the winding-up of the company, Lee said Healy sought an arbitration order against him without his presence due to existing Covid-19 travel restrictions at that time

    Lee said Healy later obtained a judgment in the latter’s favour, who then used Malaysian bankruptcy law and the US court order to make him a bankrupt

    He insisted he never chose to be a bankrupt or intended to file for bankruptcy, claiming the dispute between him and Healy was a “dirty trick” the consultant used to personally attack him as both men were once friends.

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/04/13/tamils-sikhs-usher-in-new-year-vaisakhi-on-april-14-vishu-for-malayalees-on-april-15

    04/13/2023, 17:07

    72.73% Shortened!

    These festivals will be celebrated on a grand scale across the country to usher in a new beginning for the Indian community

    Malaysia Hindu Sangam president Ganesan Thangavellu said the new year begins at 4.45pm on April 14 and this year is known as the "Shobakiruthu" year

    "As a Tamil community, we look forward to ushering in a new dawn

    We hope this new year brings more wealth for the country, unity among the people, and more celebration for the community,” he told Bernama when contacted Thursday (April 13)

    The birth of the Tamil month of Chittirai is marked annually on the first day of the Tamil solar calendar

    Malaysian Hindu Malayalee Cultural and Traditional Association president Dr NR Nambiar said according to the official panjangam (almanac) of Sri Guruvayoorappan Devaswom Kerala; Kerala Mathrubumi Panjangam; Kerala Valya Panjangam and Kerala Manorama Panjangam, Vishu will be celebrated on Saturday

    ['vaisakhi', 'year', 'tamil', 'new', 'april']

    04/13/2023, 17:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    Thursday, 13 Apr 2023

    Priscilla Hemamalini ordered the accused, Abdul Rahim Abdullah, 49, to serve the sentence concurrently from Thursday

    On the first count, he was charged with consciously making and initiating the transmission of offensive communications regarding racial issues with intent to annoy others through the "Tuk Chik" Facebook account at 3.34pm on Jan 25

    He was charged with three more counts of making and initiating the transmission of offensive communications against the King with intent to annoy others using the same Facebook account between 10.52am and 11.26am on April 2 and 3

    Earlier, deputy public prosecutor Nurilya Ellyna Nur Azmal urged the court to impose a deterrent sentence

    Healy, who is an American citizen and a lawyer, went to the US arbitration court to seek RM3 million from Lee

    Lee claimed that the court had granted a court judgement in favour of Healy without him being present, owing to the distance between Malaysia and the US, and the Covid-19 pandemic, among others

    Lee said he had offered Healy a sum of RM300,000 on March 3, but Healy did not accept the offer

    Nonetheless, Lee claimed he is "far away from insolvency"

    "On April 10, he changed to a new lawyer

    Lee added that Healy had already benefitted from consultancy fees of US$570,000 (RM2.5 million) while he was an officer at Club Excellence

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/think-tank-reminds-putrajaya-of-possible-retirement-crisis-as-new-epf-scheme-launches/64642

    04/13/2023, 17:07

    71.43% Shortened!

    As of December 2022, only 30 per cent of its contributors have savings of more than RM250,000 once they reach 55, which the fund considers to be the bare minimum needed to survive retirement

    SERC noted that a study on the effects of ageing on the economy by RAND Labour and Population Research showed for every 10 per cent increase in the elderly population above 60, a country could see a potential 5.5 per cent decline in growth

    SERC noted that just over 10 per cent of Malaysian firms invest in research and development, one of the lowest in the region

    In 2021, it was just 34.8 per cent of GDP compared to South Korea (47.9 percent), Singapore (39.4 per cent) and the Philippines (36.7 per cent)

    Malaysia’s household debt-to-GDP ratio, while still considered “manageable”, is among the highest in the region, at 81.2 per cent

    Singapore and Indonesia’s debt-to-GDP ratio are 69.7 per cent and 17.2 per cent respectively

  • CHEMICAL WASTE CAUSED SUNGAI SERDANG POLLUTION, SAYS S'GOR EXCO REP

    https://www.thestar.com.my/metro/metro-news/2023/04/13/chemical-waste-caused-sungai-serdang-pollution-says-s039gor-exco-rep

    04/13/2023, 17:07

    62.5% Shortened!

    WHITE liquid believed to be palm oil waste has been identified as the cause of poor water quality in Sungai Serdang in Kapar, Klang

    Selangor Tourism, Environment, Green Technology and Orang Asli Affairs Committee chairman Hee Loy Sian said the waste was discharged illegally

    "Investigation by the Selangor Water Management Board (Luas) found that an unidentified person driving a truck was the culprit

    In a related matter, Hee said Luas also found charcoal waste inside Sungai Serdang, which caused the water quality to drop further

    Hee said the checks were conducted following a complaint by a member of the public on Wednesday (April 12) about the deteriorating water quality of Sungai Serdang

    "Currently, there is no impact on water supply to consumers as there are no treatment plants near Sungai Serdang," he added.

    ['waste', 'water', 'sungai', 'serdang', 'hee']

  • MALAYSIAN TRANSPORT MINISTER SAYS NO OBJECTION TO AUSTRALIA RELEASING ITS OWN REPORTS ON ‘DOUBLE SIX’ SABAH PLANE CRASH

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/malaysian-transport-minister-says-no-objection-to-australia-releasing-its-own-reports-on-double-six-sabah-plane-crash/64630

    04/13/2023, 15:10

    53.85% Shortened!

    Loke said that the federal government has already communicated its views to the Australian government “way back” through the latter’s High Commision here

    “The Australian side is prepared to release the report from their end, but of course the Australian side respects our government because this accident happened in Malaysia and they have asked for our opinion and our approval to release the report

    “As far as we are concerned we have no objection, so it's up to the Australian government when to release the report,” he told a news conference here

    Loke said that he couldn't answer for a decision made by the government some 47 years ago

    “And of course probably for reasons that I do not know, and I can’t answer on behalf of the then government or the then Cabinet,” he said

    Malaysia’s final investigation report on the plane crash, classified since its completion on June 6, 1976, was released to the public yesterday and is accessible on the Transport Ministry’s website here.

    ['loke', 'say', 'government', 'release', 'report']

  • BLACKROCK AMONG FUNDS BULLISH ON MALAYSIA BONDS ON RATE BETS

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/663196

    04/13/2023, 15:09

    50.0% Shortened!

    “Malaysia bonds look attractive now that inflation has started to show signs of stabilisation

    For investors that hedge against the ringgit using three-month currency forwards, three-year government bonds offer a yield of nearly 6%, compared with around 3.3% without any hedging

    Bank Negara Malaysia has kept monetary policy unchanged at its past two meetings, a sign its key rates may be around terminal levels

    Backing that view is the fact that headline inflation slowed to 3.7% from a year earlier in February, from as high as 4.7% in August.  Nonetheless, economists surveyed by Bloomberg are still expecting a final 25-basis-point rate hike to 3% based on their median forecasts

    If Bank Negara Malaysia does boost rates by another quarter point, shorter-end bonds will still have a buffer for investors that provide them more yield than the policy rate

    Malaysia’s three-year yields are nearly 60 basis points above the overnight policy rate, compared with an average gap of 25 basis points in the five years ending 2019 before the Covid pandemic roiled global markets

    ['malaysia', 'bond', 'rate', 'yield', 'year']

    “Malaysia bonds look attractive now that inflation has started to show signs of stabilisation

    For investors that hedge against the ringgit using three-month currency forwards, three-year government bonds offer a yield of nearly 6%, compared with around 3.3% without any hedging

    Bank Negara Malaysia has kept monetary policy unchanged at its past two meetings, a sign its key rates may be around terminal levels

    Backing that view is the fact that headline inflation slowed to 3.7% from a year earlier in February, from as high as 4.7% in August.  Nonetheless, economists surveyed by Bloomberg are still expecting a final 25-basis-point rate hike to 3% based on their median forecasts

    If Bank Negara Malaysia does boost rates by another quarter point, shorter-end bonds will still have a buffer for investors that provide them more yield than the policy rate

    Malaysia’s three-year yields are nearly 60 basis points above the overnight policy rate, compared with an average gap of 25 basis points in the five years ending 2019 before the Covid pandemic roiled global markets

    ['malaysia', 'bond', 'rate', 'yield', 'year']

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/money/2023/04/13/lotus-cars-aims-to-re-establish-brand-in-malaysia-with-emira-and-eletre/64612

    04/13/2023, 15:09

    75.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, April 13 — Lotus Cars Malaysia, the sole local franchise holder for Lotus Cars, aims to reestablish the brand in Malaysia

    General manager Tengku Ezan Ley Tengku Mahaleel said Lotus’ new journey in Malaysia will be complemented by the Lotus Emira, the production of which kicked off last year, and the all-new fully electric Lotus Eletre which is launched today in the Malaysian market and for the first time in Asia

    “Market share is not a concern at the moment as we want to reestablish the Lotus car brand again in Malaysia,” he told reporters after the launch of the Lotus Eletre here today

    For the record, Proton was the owner of Lotus Cars from 1996 to 2017

    They come in three variants — Eletre, Eletre S and Eletre R

    For the Eletre, he sees new clients from a younger age group, compared to a majority of 40 years and above previously He expects 50-60 per cent of demand for the Eletre S variant (price from RM648,000), 15 per cent for Eletre R (price from RM798,000) and 25 per cent for Eletre (price from RM578,000)

    ['lotus', 'car', 'malaysia', 'eletre', 'per']

  • TOK MAT: SHABBY POST-SERVICE CAREER PATH NOT ONLY FACTOR BEHIND NON-BUMI RELUCTANCE TO JOIN ARMED FORCES

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/tok-mat-shabby-post-service-career-path-not-only-factor-behind-non-bumi-reluctance-to-join-armed-forces/64605

    04/13/2023, 15:07

    53.85% Shortened!

    In a press conference, the minister known as Tok Mat said that military service is also seen as less appealing due to other career paths that provide better financial compensation

    “So it’s not just due to one factor such as the retirement plan for military retirees,” he told the press at the ministry here

    The minister was responding to Perikatan Nasional’s (PN) Ketereh MP Datuk Khlir Mohd Nor, a former major-general in the military, who said that an unclear career trajectory post-military service is one of the main reasons why non-Bumiputeras are uninterested to serve in the country’s military defence

    Khlir then urged the government to offer a better scheme for veterans who are desperate to have a better post-military service life

    At the moment, military personnel have options to retire after 12, 15 or 18 years of service

    Previously, Mohamad told Parliament that less than 3 per cent of non-Bumiputeras have joined the military because of a lack of interest in the security personnel’s scope of work.

    ['career', 'military', 'service', 'non', 'bumiputeras']

    Lotus has launched its first SUV in Malaysia, the Eletre

    Built at a new plant in Wuhan, China, the Lotus Eletre is available in three variants, including a high-performance range-topping Eletre R

    If Lotus hasn’t been able to trim the weight of the Eletre, then the least it could do is cheat the air with an aerodynamic design

    There are also active components like the petal-like opening grille as well as an active rear spoiler on the Eletre S and R, fed by the standard split tailgate spoilers

    At the rear is an eight-inch touchscreen that can be also be folded down, incorporating controls for the rear air-conditioning (the car comes with four-zone automatic air-con as standard), media and, if fitted, rear seat power adjustment

    In Malaysia, the Eletre comes in a five-seater layout as standard with power-adjustable front bucket seats and powered rear seat recline

    Penang Water Supply Corporation (PBAPP) chief executive officer K

    "Due to climate change, low rainfall was recorded in the water catchment areas of Air Itam and Teluk Bahang Dams, and this has caused the water levels of the dams to drop significantly," said Pathmanathan in a statement on Thursday (April 13)

    "We hope Nadma would prioritise Penang's request because cloud seeding operations were needed as soon as possible to induce rainfall to refill the dams," he said, adding that the state has allocated RM400,000 for the operations

    The advantage was we could bring Martial back slowly, giving him minutes, but I think already against Everton he was ready to start the game." United's attack has been far more potent with a mobile No.9, whether that be Rashford pre-injury or Martial

    But if Ten Hag wants to maintain that dynamic then the United chief will have to rely on Martial for 90 minutes, something he has not managed all season

    ['united', 'rashford', 'martial', 'minute', 'sevilla']

    United's top scorer pulled up in the 2-0 win over Everton on Saturday just minutes after setting Martial up for the second goal

    What will concern Ten Hag more whether Martial can complete 90 minutes

    "We don't have to force things, we are careful," Ten Hag said of Martial's return on Wednesday

    The advantage was we could bring Martial back slowly, giving him minutes, but I think already against Everton he was ready to start the game." United's attack has been far more potent with a mobile No.9, whether that be Rashford pre-injury or Martial

    But if Ten Hag wants to maintain that dynamic then the United chief will have to rely on Martial for 90 minutes, something he has not managed all season

  • BYE-BYE TUPPERWARE? BRAND SYNONYMOUS WITH MALAYSIAN HOUSEHOLDS ON THE VERGE OF BANKRUPTCY

    https://www.therakyatpost.com/news/2023/04/13/bye-bye-tupperware-brand-synonymous-with-malaysian-households-on-the-verge-of-bankruptcy/

    04/13/2023, 14:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    ‘Tupperware’ – a globally well-known company that has been around for almost 8 decades stated that there’s a high chance of them going out of business soon

    According to a paper titled ‘A Study on Tupperware Brand Success in The Malaysian Market’ published by researchers Abdullah, Devi & Chandran in 2017, no matter what brand or quality, the plastic container is frequently referred to as “Tupperware” in practically every family in Malaysia, especially by mothers

    Malaysians have childhood recollections of Tupperware products since they have grown up with them since the company’s arrival here 53 years ago as reported by New Straits Times

    It is safe to say that at one point of time, hell will break loose if you lose or damage containers from Tupperware

    Datuk Mohd Nor Khalid (more affectionately known as Lat) during a collaboration with Tupperware Brands, recalls the time when his mother frequently had Tupperware parties in the 1960s with her friends at their home in Sungai Rokam, Ipoh

    However, the Tupperware brand founded by Earl Tupper in 1946 might be saying its final goodbyes if they could not come out of the liquidity crisis that they are facing now

    ['share', 'tupperware', 'company', 'report', 'brand']

    04/13/2023

    81.25% Shortened!

    In 2021, Emerson merged its software units with smaller rival Aspen Technology as part of its industrial automation push

    National Instruments launched a formal sale process in January after Emerson threatened to challenge its board if it did not engage in deal negotiations

    Emerson dropped its hostile bid once an auction for National Instruments got underway

    Bloomberg first reported about the talks advancing between Emerson and National Instruments on Tuesday

    Reuters first reported in March that Emerson, Fortive and Keysight were through to the final round of bidding for National Instruments, after breaking news of Emerson's interest in January

    The deal is expected to close in the first half of Emerson's fiscal 2024

  • UNCLAIMED MONEY AT RM11BIL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2023/04/13/unclaimed-money-at-rm11bil

    04/13/2023

    70.0% Shortened!

    “The interest earned (from fixed deposits) is accounted for under the Consolidated Revenue Account

    He said WTD is defined as money that is legally payable to the owner but has remained unpaid for a period of not less than one year or money standing to the credit of an account that has not been operated in whatever manner by the owner for a period of not less than seven years

    It also includes money in credit on a trade account that has remained dormant for a period of not less than two years, he added

    He urged the owners of the unclaimed money to claim their money by submitting applications through the eGUMIS portal at JANM counters nationwide or by mail to the WTD Putrajaya office

    He said that JANM is developing the eGUMIS mobile application, which should be ready for use by the end of this year

    Ahmad also said the government intends to amend Act 370, which involves the reduction of the period of transfers of money to the Consolidated Revenue Account from 15 years to 10 years

    ['money', 'wtd', 'year', 'say', 'amount']

    “The interest earned (from fixed deposits) is accounted for under the Consolidated Revenue Account

    He said WTD is defined as money that is legally payable to the owner but has remained unpaid for a period of not less than one year or money standing to the credit of an account that has not been operated in whatever manner by the owner for a period of not less than seven years

    It also includes money in credit on a trade account that has remained dormant for a period of not less than two years, he added

    He urged the owners of the unclaimed money to claim their money by submitting applications through the eGUMIS portal at JANM counters nationwide or by mail to the WTD Putrajaya office

    He said that JANM is developing the eGUMIS mobile application, which should be ready for use by the end of this year

  • TOK MAT: SHABBY POST-SERVICE CAREER PATH NOT ONLY FACTOR BEHIND NON-BUMI'S RELUCTANCE TO JOIN ARMED FORCES

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/tok-mat-shabby-post-service-career-path-not-only-factor-behind-non-bumi-reluctance-to-join-armed-forces/64605

    04/13/2023, 13:12

    53.85% Shortened!

    In a press conference, the minister known as Tok Mat said that military service is also seen as less appealing due to other career paths that provide better financial compensation

    “So it’s not just due to one factor such as the retirement plan for military retirees,” he told the press at the ministry here

    The minister was responding to Perikatan Nasional’s (PN) Ketereh MP Datuk Khlir Mohd Nor, a former major-general in the military, who said that an unclear career trajectory post-military service is one of the main reasons why non-Bumiputeras are uninterested to serve in the country’s military defence

    Khlir then urged the government to offer a better scheme for veterans who are desperate to have a better post-military service life

    At the moment, military personnel have options to retire after 12, 15 or 18 years of service

    Previously, Mohamad told Parliament that less than 3 per cent of non-Bumiputeras have joined the military because of a lack of interest in the security personnel’s scope of work.

    ['career', 'military', 'service', 'non', 'bumiputeras']

  • HEALTH MINISTRY NABS FOUR IN CRACKDOWN ON UNLICENSED DENTISTS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/04/13/health-ministry-nabs-four-in-crackdown-on-unlicensed-dentists

    04/13/2023, 13:09

    68.42% Shortened!

    In raids from June to December last year, four were caught by Health Ministry officers and brought to court, Health Ministry Dental director special officer Dr Mustapha told The Star

    Three of them were charged under Section 62(1) of Dental Act 2018 (Act 804) for the illegal practice of dentistry without a licence while one was charged under Section 68 of the same Act for the employment of a fake dentist

    The illegal dentist employer convicted under Section 68 was meanwhile fined RM50,000 by court

    Health Ministry Oral Health Legislation and Enforcement deputy director Dr Haznita Zainal said that the government would continue to actively crack down on illegal and unlicensed dentistry across the country

    "The sentences that were handed down by the court are beyond the jurisdiction of the ministry

    The Dental Act 2018 came into effect in January last year and replaced the previous outdated Dental Act 1971

    ['fake', 'dentist', 'illegal', 'health', 'ministry']

    In raids from June to December last year, four were caught by Health Ministry officers and brought to court, Health Ministry Dental director special officer Dr Mustapha told The Star

    Three of them were charged under Section 62(1) of Dental Act 2018 (Act 804) for the illegal practice of dentistry without a licence while one was charged under Section 68 of the same Act for the employment of a fake dentist

    The illegal dentist employer convicted under Section 68 was meanwhile fined RM50,000 by court

    Health Ministry Oral Health Legislation and Enforcement deputy director Dr Haznita Zainal said that the government would continue to actively crack down on illegal and unlicensed dentistry across the country

    "The sentences that were handed down by the court are beyond the jurisdiction of the ministry

    The Dental Act 2018 came into effect in January last year and replaced the previous outdated Dental Act 1971

  • ALIBABA SHARES PLUNGE ON SOFTBANK'S STAKE SALE REPORT

    https://maa.theedgemarkets.com/node/663197

    04/13/2023, 13:07

    70.0% Shortened!

    SoftBank's share price closed down 1% on Thursday (April 13), versus a 0.3% rise in the broader market

    Alibaba, one of the most valuable assets in SoftBank's portfolio, tumbled as much as 5.2% in Hong Kong after the report before paring the loss to 2%

    SoftBank has been seeking ways to monetise its stake in Alibaba, which the Japanese conglomerate bought into more than two decades ago with just US$20 million (RM88 million) spending

    Alibaba's US-listed stock fell 1.3% in after-market trade on Wednesday

    SoftBank aims to list British chip designer Arm this year in an initial public offering (IPO) that would raise at least US$8 billion, people familiar with the deal told Reuters last month

    On Wednesday, the FT said forward sales based on filings at the US Securities and Exchange Commission showed SoftBank's Alibaba stake would eventually fall to 3.8% from almost 15%

  • VIVO, OPPO AND ONEPLUS MAY HALT SMARTPHONE SALES IN GERMANY BECAUSE OF NOKIA. HERE'S WHY

    https://soyacincau.com/2023/04/13/vivo-oppo-and-oneplus-may-halt-smartphone-sales-in-germany-because-of-nokia-heres-why/

    04/13/2023, 13:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    Vivo Germany had issued a short press release, highlighting the situation they find themselves in

    According to Vivo, they have been negotiating with Nokia about renewing their deal with the Finnish brand, but at the moment have not been able to reach an agreement

    Furthermore, it looks like Vivo Germany is holding Nokia responsible for the licensing deal stalling, stating that they believe Nokia has yet to offer them a license that’s fair, reasonable and non-discriminatory

    This doesn’t stop the German courts from taking note of the situation though, and with Vivo technically using Nokia’s patents without a license at the moment, the District Court of Mannheim has ruled that Vivo will be forced to halt all smartphone business in Germany until a licensing deal is achieved

    Vivo Germany claims they’ll still be negotiating with Nokia in the meantime

    With Vivo set to join Oppo and OnePlus is putting their business on hold in Germany unless a deal is struck, rumours continue that the three BBK Group giants are looking at a wider withdrawal from not just Germany but also from Europe

    ['germany', 'oppo', 'oneplus', 'look', 'vivo']

    This doesn’t stop the German courts from taking note of the situation though, and with Vivo technically using Nokia’s patents without a license at the moment, the District Court of Mannheim has ruled that Vivo will be forced to halt all smartphone business in Germany until a licensing deal is achieved

    Reuters first reported that Beijing had initially notified Taipei it would impose a no-fly zone from April 16-18, but Taiwan's transport ministry said this was later reduced to a period of just 27 minutes on Sunday morning after it protested

    Taiwan's transport ministry on Wednesday published a map showing what it labelled China's "aerospace activity zone" to the northeast of Taiwan and near a group of disputed islets called Diaoyu by China and Senkaku by Japan

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/663210

    04/13/2023, 13:07

    75.0% Shortened!

    Thursday was the first case management for the prosecution’s appeal with regard to the acquittal of the former prime minister and Arul Kanda on March 3

    The judge agreed with Najib’s defence team that the prosecution had failed to prove a causal link between the amendments made in the audit report to the first audit report and the purported alleged gratification

    “The prosecution has failed to prove how the items removed or amended could give rise to civil or criminal liability to Najib

    This was the first case where a co-accused was offered a certificate of indemnity under this Section of the Act

    Najib, 69, was charged with abuse of power as a public officer in his capacity as the then prime minister and finance minister in altering the 1MDB audit report prepared by the National Audit Department, which was to be tabled before the PAC in March 2016

    The charge was framed under Section 23(1) of the MACC Act 2009, while Arul Kanda was charged with abetting the former PM

    ['1mdb', 'arul', 'kanda', 'appeal', 'najib']

  • BEWARE OF CLONE FINANCIAL PLANNING FIRM SCAM, SAYS FPAM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/04/13/beware-of-clone-financial-planning-firm-scam-says-fpam

    04/13/2023, 13:07

    50.0% Shortened!

    In a statement today, FPAM warned that scammers would use financial planning companies' key names on bogus companies to confuse the public and add them to social media chat groups while pretending to represent legitimate financial planning firms

    The association said that nine financial planning firms -- all of them members of the association -- have had their names cloned to promote illegal schemes

    "Their actual names are Wealth Vantage Advisory Sdn Bhd, Genexus Advisory Sdn Bhd, Excellentte Consultancy Sdn Bhd, Alpine Advisory Sdn Bhd, UOB Kay Hian Securities (M) Sdn Bhd, CC Advisory Sdn Bhd, Harveston Wealth Management Sdn Bhd, iFast Capital Sdn Bhd and Kenanga Investors Bhd,” it said

    To protect from being scammed, FPAM advised members of the public to check with the Securities Commission Malaysia’s (SC) list of licensed and registered persons and check with the financial planning firm itself before making any payments or investments

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['financial', 'planning', 'fpam', 'name', 'firm']

    In a statement today, FPAM warned that scammers would use financial planning companies' key names on bogus companies to confuse the public and add them to social media chat groups while pretending to represent legitimate financial planning firms

    The association said that nine financial planning firms -- all of them members of the association -- have had their names cloned to promote illegal schemes

    "Their actual names are Wealth Vantage Advisory Sdn Bhd, Genexus Advisory Sdn Bhd, Excellentte Consultancy Sdn Bhd, Alpine Advisory Sdn Bhd, UOB Kay Hian Securities (M) Sdn Bhd, CC Advisory Sdn Bhd, Harveston Wealth Management Sdn Bhd, iFast Capital Sdn Bhd and Kenanga Investors Bhd,” it said

    To protect from being scammed, FPAM advised members of the public to check with the Securities Commission Malaysia’s (SC) list of licensed and registered persons and check with the financial planning firm itself before making any payments or investments

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['financial', 'planning', 'fpam', 'name', 'firm']



  • SPEED UP REFORMS TO AVOID ANOTHER SUDDEN CHANGE OF POWER, BERSIH TELLS ANWAR ADMINISTRATION

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/speed-up-reforms-to-avoid-another-sudden-change-of-power-bersih-tells-anwar-administration/64597

    04/13/2023, 13:07

    64.71% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, April 13 — Electoral watchdog Bersih has today urged Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim’s coalition federal government to speed up some of the political reforms it had promised or risk further turmoil and instability in government

    Which means there’s the possibility that this government may not last long

    “That’s why we see political manoeuvring like those trying to get Najib pardoned and charges against our deputy prime minister Datuk Seri Zahid Hamidi dropped,” its chairman Thomas Fann said, referring to convict former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak

    Bersih said the first thing the government should do is give equal rights to the back benchers and Opposition party MPs in Parliament

    Fann said this would take away some pressure for a change of government since the back benchers and Opposition feel their voices are heard in Parliament

    This would strengthen the stability of the government and is in line with the Malaysia Madani and goodwill," said Fann

    ['bersih', 'datuk', 'seri', 'government', 'political']

    Which means there’s the possibility that this government may not last long

    “That’s why we see political manoeuvring like those trying to get Najib pardoned and charges against our deputy prime minister Datuk Seri Zahid Hamidi dropped,” its chairman Thomas Fann said, referring to convict former prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak

  • 2024 ACURA INTEGRA TYPE S DEBUTS IN THE US - HONDA CIVIC TYPE R ENGINE WITH 320 HP; SIX-SPEED MANUAL - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2023/04/13/2024-acura-integra-type-s-debuts-in-the-us/

    04/13/2023, 12:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    If you were disappointed when the Integra nameplate was revived last March, the new Type S is here to remedy that

    Where the Civic Type R is rated at 315 hp in the US, the Integra Type S offers 320 hp – torque is kept the same at 420 Nm

    According to Acura, the increased output over the Civic Type R is thanks to a new high-flow exhaust system for the K20C that is exclusive to the Type S

    Compared to the regular Integra, the Type S also comes with wider front and rear tracks as well as a thicker front stabiliser bar

    As for the interior, the Type S only has seating for four instead of five in the standard Integra, while other differences include extra seat bolstering and a new shift knob

    Some features that the Type S gets that the Civic Type R doesn’t include a head-up display and a 16-speaker ELS sound system

    ['april', 'integra', 'type', 'march', 'civic']

    04/13/2023, 11:37

    45.45% Shortened!

    Thursday, 13 Apr 2023

    Bukit Aman Corporate Communications chief Asst Comm A

    "A team from Bukit Aman CID Special Investigation Unit (USJT) arrested the suspect and seized a mobile phone and a laptop," he said in a statement on Thursday (April 13)

    The suspect will be remanded to assist investigation under Section 4(1) of the Sedition Act 1948

    "We are also investigating under Section 233 of the Communication, and Multimedia Act 1998 which is misuse of network facilities," he said.

  • AGC 'NO' TO ZURAIDA'S BID

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/04/13/agc-no-to-zuraidas-bid

    04/13/2023

    60.0% Shortened!

    Kogilambigai, in her submission, told the High Court the dispute in PBM was an internal matter for the parties to resolve

    “However, the RoS did not recognise her as the party president,” he said

    Zuraida, 65, who filed the application on March 24 and named RoS as the sole respondent, sought a declaration that RoS’ action to retain Datuk Larry Soon @ Larry Sng Wei Shen as the PBM president was unlawful and a mandamus order to compel the RoS to recognise her as the PBM’s rightful president effective Oct 7, 2022

    The former Ampang Member of Parliament, in her affidavit, said she received a letter from PBM on Oct 27, 2022, informing her about her appointment as PBM president

    However, Zuraida said she received another letter from the party dated Dec 19 of the same year, in which Soon declared himself as the PBM president and suspended her membership

    The former plantation industries and commodities minister said she learnt of her sacking from PBM through The Star portal on Dec 27, 2022, but never received notice or information from the party about it

    ['zuraida', 'ro', 'pbm', 'president', 'party']

  • POSSIBLE IMPLICATIONS OF RAISING THE RETIREMENT AGE TO 65 IN MALAYSIA — PAUL ANTHONY MARIADAS AND UMA MURTHY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/what-you-think/2023/04/13/possible-implications-of-raising-the-retirement-age-to-65-in-malaysia-paul-anthony-mariadas-and-uma-murthy/64573

    04/13/2023, 11:07

    81.82% Shortened!

    By encouraging older workers to remain in the workforce, the country could increase its overall labour force participation rate

    According to a report by the World Bank, a 1 per cent increase in the labour force participation rate in Malaysia could result in a 0.5 per cent increase in GDP per capita

    This suggests that individuals who work beyond the age of 60 may be able to accumulate additional retirement savings

    In addition, if more individuals remain in the workforce past the age of 60, there may be a reduced need for social welfare programmes such as old age pensions

    However, there are also potential challenges associated with raising the retirement age

    Older workers may face age discrimination in the workplace, which could make it difficult for them to find or keep employment

    ['retirement', 'age', 'per', 'old', 'worker']

    By encouraging older workers to remain in the workforce, the country could increase its overall labour force participation rate

    According to a report by the World Bank, a 1 per cent increase in the labour force participation rate in Malaysia could result in a 0.5 per cent increase in GDP per capita

    This suggests that individuals who work beyond the age of 60 may be able to accumulate additional retirement savings

    In addition, if more individuals remain in the workforce past the age of 60, there may be a reduced need for social welfare programmes such as old age pensions

    However, there are also potential challenges associated with raising the retirement age

    Older workers may face age discrimination in the workplace, which could make it difficult for them to find or keep employment

    ['retirement', 'age', 'per', 'old', 'worker']

    It is imperative that Liverpool does not get it wrong again in the next transfer window

    https://www.lowyat.net/2023/298556/lotus-eletre-ev-malaysia-price-specs/

    04/13/2023, 11:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    Just moments ago, the Geely and Etika Automotive subsidiary officially unveiled its first full-electric SUV, the Lotus Eletre in our market

    At the same time, the new all-electric SUV is said to have the aero performance of Evija full-electric hypercar

    Built using the 800V Electric Premium Architecture, the Lotus Eletre features a dual-motor all-wheel-drive setup

    Interestingly enough, Lotus Cars Malaysia is bringing all three variants of the Eletre into our market including the top of the range option, the Eletre R which can deliver 675kw (905hp) of output and 985Nm of torque

    Regardless of the version that one prefers, all three Eletre variants come with a 112kWh battery

    For example, the Eletre R maxes out at 490km according to WLTP standards but the standard Eletre and Eletre S can go as far as 600km

    ['malaysia', 'lotus', 'electric', 'suv', 'eletre']

  • JAPAN SAYS EVACUATION WARNING FOR NORTH KOREA MISSILE WAS NOT A MISTAKE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2023/04/13/japan-says-evacuation-warning-for-north-korea-missile-was-not-a-mistake

    04/13/2023, 11:07

    45.45% Shortened!

    Thursday, 13 Apr 2023

    A TV screen displays a warning message called "J-alert" after the Japanese government issued an alert, following a ballistic missile launch by North Korea, in this photo taken in Tokyo, Japan April 13, 2023

    "We did not correct the information issued by the J-Alert" emergency broadcasting system, Chief Cabinet Secretary Hirokazu Matsuno told a news conference

    He said the North Korean missile disappeared from Japan's radar immediately after detection, and a further analysis found that there was no possibility of its landing in Japan's territory, leading to the lifting of the evacuation warning

    "The J-Alert warning was issued to inform citizens of the danger of a falling missile to prioritise citizens' safety," Matsuno said

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['warn', 'alert', 'japanese', 'government', 'issue']

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/khairy-says-anwars-greatest-challenge-in-coming-six-state-polls-is-to-raise-malay-votes/64576

    72.73% Shortened!

    Khairy said that Anwar also has to deal with the Umno “headache”

    Though Umno is now a PH ally, Khairy said Anwar is being weighed down by his old friend Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi who is now the Malay nationalist party president and deputy prime minister

    Khairy – who had openly challenged Zahid’s leadership of Umno during and after GE15 – labeled the Bagan Datuk MP a “deadweight” for Anwar

    “Of greater concern to Anwar is if Umno becomes an electoral liability during the state polls,” Khairy wrote

    The former Health minister noted that Zahid has told Umno to formally petition the King for Najib’s pardon

    Khairy said that Anwar’s support may crumble if the PM fails to defend the judiciary against the ongoing smear campaign against the SRC trial judge who convicted Najib.

  • LOTUS ELETRE EV LAUNCHED IN MALAYSIA – UP TO 905 HP, 0-100 IN 2.95S, 600 KM WLTP RANGE; RM578K-RM798K - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2023/04/13/lotus-eletre-ev-launched-in-malaysia/

    04/13/2023, 10:12

    84.62% Shortened!

    Prices for the Eletre in Malaysia start from RM578,000 for the base Eletre, from RM648,000 for the Eletre S, and from RM798,000 for the Eletre R

    All three variants get a 112 kWh battery, which provides the Eletre and Eletre S with a range of 600 km on the WLTP cycle, while the most powerful Eletre R has a range of 490 km (WLTP)

    Added to the Eletre S and R variants are self-dimming side mirrors, rear privacy glass and soft-closing doors, with the Carbon Pack standard on the top Eletre R

    On the move, five driver modes are available as standard for the Eletre range – Range, Tour, Sport, Off-Road and Individual, with the Eletre R additionally receiving a Track mode

    Customers can further personalise their Eletre with a selection of option packs; these include the Lotus Dynamic Handling Pack, Ceramic Brake Pack, Executive Seat Pack, Comfort Seat Pack, Carbon Fibre Pack, Extended Carbon Fibre Pack and Interior Carbon Fibre Pack, as well as a Parking Pack and a Highway Assist Pack for the ADAS set

    To recap, prices for the Lotus Eletre in Malaysia start from RM578,000 for the base Eletre, from RM648,000 for the Eletre S, and from RM798,000 for the Eletre R

    ['car', 'malaysia', 'lotus', 'eletre', 'variant']

    Prices for the Eletre in Malaysia start from RM578,000 for the base Eletre, from RM648,000 for the Eletre S, and from RM798,000 for the Eletre R

    All three variants get a 112 kWh battery, which provides the Eletre and Eletre S with a range of 600 km on the WLTP cycle, while the most powerful Eletre R has a range of 490 km (WLTP)

    Added to the Eletre S and R variants are self-dimming side mirrors, rear privacy glass and soft-closing doors, with the Carbon Pack standard on the top Eletre R

    On the move, five driver modes are available as standard for the Eletre range – Range, Tour, Sport, Off-Road and Individual, with the Eletre R additionally receiving a Track mode

    Customers can further personalise their Eletre with a selection of option packs; these include the Lotus Dynamic Handling Pack, Ceramic Brake Pack, Executive Seat Pack, Comfort Seat Pack, Carbon Fibre Pack, Extended Carbon Fibre Pack and Interior Carbon Fibre Pack, as well as a Parking Pack and a Highway Assist Pack for the ADAS set

    To recap, prices for the Lotus Eletre in Malaysia start from RM578,000 for the base Eletre, from RM648,000 for the Eletre S, and from RM798,000 for the Eletre R

    The nature of the victim’s work was not stated

    What happened On Aug 31 last year, the victim entered the female toilet on the second floor of her workplace

    The man followed her in without her knowledge, intending to take a video of her private parts with his phone

    As the victim was relieving herself in one of the cubicles, the man noticed that the cubicle next to hers was unoccupied and decided to use it to record the victim

    He entered the vacant cubicle and locked the cubicle door behind him

    She knocked several times on the locked cubicle door where the man remained and she forced him to eventually open the door

    In hindsight, not signing Fernández back then while he was still in Argentina was clearly a mistake both from Liverpool's and Chelsea's perspectives

    Liverpool doesn't want to regret not pulling the trigger on Varela as well

    04/13/2023, 10:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    At the opening bell, the FBM KLCI was down 1.87 points to 1,433.87, traking the negative performance of Wall Street on the back of the weaker economic outlook

    Leading tech counters included MPI falling 26 sen to RM28.62, D&O dropping seven sen to RM4.22 and Pentamaster shedding seven sen to RM4.93

    Meanwhile, AirAsia X slumped nine sen to RM1.26 as it applied once again to Bursa Securities for an extension of time to submit its regularisation plan

    Sister company Capital A fell 2.5 sen to 78.5 sen as the regularisation plan was expected to lift both companies out of Practice Note 17 status

    Most actively traded in the opening minutes of trade were Hong Seng unchanged at 13 sen, Jade Marvel up one sne ot 31 sen and Revenue down 0.5 sen to 32.5 sen.

    ['minute', 'fbm', 'klci', 'bursa', 'sen']

    At the opening bell, the FBM KLCI was down 1.87 points to 1,433.87, traking the negative performance of Wall Street on the back of the weaker economic outlook

    Leading tech counters included MPI falling 26 sen to RM28.62, D&O dropping seven sen to RM4.22 and Pentamaster shedding seven sen to RM4.93

    Meanwhile, AirAsia X slumped nine sen to RM1.26 as it applied once again to Bursa Securities for an extension of time to submit its regularisation plan

    Sister company Capital A fell 2.5 sen to 78.5 sen as the regularisation plan was expected to lift both companies out of Practice Note 17 status

    Most actively traded in the opening minutes of trade were Hong Seng unchanged at 13 sen, Jade Marvel up one sne ot 31 sen and Revenue down 0.5 sen to 32.5 sen.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['minute', 'fbm', 'klci', 'bursa', 'sen']



  • UNIFI’S FIBRE BROADBAND PLAN DOES NOT OFFER ‘TRUE 2GBPS’ SPEED

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/tech-gadgets/2023/04/13/unifis-fibre-broadband-plan-does-not-offer-true-2gbps-speed/64554

    04/13/2023, 10:07

    70.0% Shortened!

    Essentially, the 2Gbps Unifi plan is a 2x 1Gbps offering

    Instead of a higher maximum speed (2Gbps), you have double the bandwidth (2x 1Gbps) that can support more devices in the same home

    According to Unifi’s FAQ, the provided Unifi Optical Network router has 4 available LAN ports and each port can deliver a maximum of 1Gbps to a third-party router, Mesh node or other devices via a wired connection

    Subscribers of the 2Gbps and 1Gbps plan will receive one Optical Network Router that acts as the (Optical Network Unit) and another unit that acts as a Mesh WiFi to extend your home’s WiFi coverage

    Also included is a free Unifi Plus Box

    The 2Gbps plan has an upload speed of 1Gbps while the 1Gbps plan has an upload speed of 500Mbps

    ['unifi', 'fibre', '2gbps', '1gbps', 'speed']

    Essentially, the 2Gbps Unifi plan is a 2x 1Gbps offering

    Instead of a higher maximum speed (2Gbps), you have double the bandwidth (2x 1Gbps) that can support more devices in the same home

    According to Unifi’s FAQ, the provided Unifi Optical Network router has 4 available LAN ports and each port can deliver a maximum of 1Gbps to a third-party router, Mesh node or other devices via a wired connection

    Subscribers of the 2Gbps and 1Gbps plan will receive one Optical Network Router that acts as the (Optical Network Unit) and another unit that acts as a Mesh WiFi to extend your home’s WiFi coverage

    Also included is a free Unifi Plus Box

    The 2Gbps plan has an upload speed of 1Gbps while the 1Gbps plan has an upload speed of 500Mbps

    ['unifi', 'fibre', '2gbps', '1gbps', 'speed']

    04/13/2023, 10:07

    80.0% Shortened!

    The nature of the victim’s work was not stated

    What happened On Aug 31 last year, the victim entered the female toilet on the second floor of her workplace

    The man followed her in without her knowledge, intending to take a video of her private parts with his phone

    As the victim was relieving herself in one of the cubicles, the man noticed that the cubicle next to hers was unoccupied and decided to use it to record the victim

    He entered the vacant cubicle and locked the cubicle door behind him

    She knocked several times on the locked cubicle door where the man remained and she forced him to eventually open the door

    ['female', 'toilet', 'take', 'video', 'cubicle']

  • LAWYERS SAY SEIZURE OF LAWAS CANCER PATIENT'S MYKAD UNLAWFUL, MUST BE RETURNED

    https://www.theborneopost.com/2023/04/13/lawyers-say-seizure-of-lawas-cancer-patients-mykad-unlawful-must-be-returned/

    04/13/2023, 09:08

    64.71% Shortened!

    Zaid Malek said it was the woman’s right to have her MyKad, unless an order or deprivation of citizenship is made in compliance with the Federal Constitution

    LFL director Zaid Malek in a statement yesterday said it was the woman’s right to have her MyKad, unless an order or deprivation of citizenship is made in compliance with the Federal Constitution

    “The seizure of the MyKad of an individual is without a doubt unlawful and unconstitutional act by the JPN to which there can be no justification,” he said

    It deprived the woman of her citizenship and her rights attached to it

    The Federal Constitution clearly stipulates that there are procedures in place that must be complied with by the government if it intends to strip anyone of their citizenship

    “Thus, the individual retains their citizenship until and unless an order for its deprivation is made in compliance with the Constitution; yet her MyKad was taken away and her rights are now affected, most worrying of which is her right to get treatment for cancer at government hospitals

    ['say', 'woman', 'right', 'mykad', 'citizenship']

    “The seizure of the MyKad of an individual is without a doubt unlawful and unconstitutional act by the JPN to which there can be no justification,” he said

    It deprived the woman of her citizenship and her rights attached to it

    And Ancelotti, regularly known for looking calm and slick on the touchline, showed he still has the football ability during the game as he controlled a ball that came his way

    Carlo Ancelotti shocked fans with his slick control on the touchline during Real Madrid's game against Chelsea Ancelotti controlled the ball and enjoyed a few touches before volleying it back towards the pitch  The Real Madrid boss is trying to win his fifth Champions League title as a manager The Italian, hands in pockets, controlled the ball with the inside of his right foot as he showed the focus that rarely leaves his face during games

    He then kicked the ball up again with his left foot, his right hand still in his pocket, before kneeing the ball right his right knee to set up a pass back

    He then volleyed the ball back towards the pitch to the amusement of those in attendance at the Bernabeu

    'Carlo Ancelotti showed more skill than all Chelsea players combined,' joked one fan on Twitter

    His side took a giant leap towards the semi-finals with a dominant 2-0 win over Chelsea 'Ancelotti should play Right Back after that beautiful bit of skill,' added a third

  • CHONG WEI KEEN TO PLAY BIGGER ROLE IN DELIVERING FIRST GOLD IN PARIS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2023/04/13/lee-im-game

    04/13/2023, 08:07

    66.67% Shortened!

    Chong Wei is the country’s most successful Olympian after winning silver in the 2008 Beijing, 2012 London and 2016 Rio Olympics

    The Badminton of Malaysia (BAM) has proposed Chong Wei as the team manager for the badminton team’s Road to Gold (RTG) high performance training programme

    The 40-year-old is already part of the RTG committee and is happy to take on the role of guiding the shuttlers included in the programme

    “While I am already part of the RTG Committee, if appointed as the RTG badminton team manager, this will mean an increased focus on badminton and a closer hands-on role in terms of assisting them in their preparation,” said Chong Wei

    “This is an enormous responsibility, but if appointed, I am ready to take it on and play my part to help Malaysia

    “There will be many challenges along the way, both for the team and me as team manager, but we must do our very best for the sake of the millions of Malaysian fans.”

    ['chong', 'wei', 'gold', 'badminton', 'team']

    Chong Wei is the country’s most successful Olympian after winning silver in the 2008 Beijing, 2012 London and 2016 Rio Olympics

    The Badminton of Malaysia (BAM) has proposed Chong Wei as the team manager for the badminton team’s Road to Gold (RTG) high performance training programme

    The 40-year-old is already part of the RTG committee and is happy to take on the role of guiding the shuttlers included in the programme

    “While I am already part of the RTG Committee, if appointed as the RTG badminton team manager, this will mean an increased focus on badminton and a closer hands-on role in terms of assisting them in their preparation,” said Chong Wei

    “This is an enormous responsibility, but if appointed, I am ready to take it on and play my part to help Malaysia

    “There will be many challenges along the way, both for the team and me as team manager, but we must do our very best for the sake of the millions of Malaysian fans.”

  • MAN UNITED BIDDING PROCESS GOES TO THIRD ROUND

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/sports/2023/04/13/man-united-bidding-process-goes-to-third-round/64540

    04/13/2023, 08:07

    53.85% Shortened!

    Qatari banker Sheikh Jassim Bin Hamad Bin Jassim Bin Jaber Al Thani and British billionaire Jim Ratcliffe both submitted a second bid for the Premier League club last month

    Several offers are understood to have been received in recent weeks but Sheikh Jassim and Ratcliffe remain the front runners to buy United should the Glazers give up control of the club they bought in 2005 for £790 million (RM4.35 billion)

    United’s unpopular owners announced in November they were conducting a strategic review, with the sale of the club one option being considered

    The Qatari group has reportedly made an offer of about £5 billion for 100 per cent ownership of the club while Ratcliffe, a boyhood United fan, wants to buy the combined Glazer shareholding of 69 per cent

    “Jim Ratcliffe, Sheikh Jassim and myself all were ready to negotiate a deal to buy United

    “I will not participate in a farce set up to maximise the profit for the sellers at the expense of Manchester United.” “The bidding is turning into a farce, with Glazers giving no respect to the club,” he added

    ['united', 'jassim', 'ratcliffe', 'club', 'glazer']

    Qatari banker Sheikh Jassim Bin Hamad Bin Jassim Bin Jaber Al Thani and British billionaire Jim Ratcliffe both submitted a second bid for the Premier League club last month

    Several offers are understood to have been received in recent weeks but Sheikh Jassim and Ratcliffe remain the front runners to buy United should the Glazers give up control of the club they bought in 2005 for £790 million (RM4.35 billion)

    United’s unpopular owners announced in November they were conducting a strategic review, with the sale of the club one option being considered

    The Qatari group has reportedly made an offer of about £5 billion for 100 per cent ownership of the club while Ratcliffe, a boyhood United fan, wants to buy the combined Glazer shareholding of 69 per cent

    “Jim Ratcliffe, Sheikh Jassim and myself all were ready to negotiate a deal to buy United

    “I will not participate in a farce set up to maximise the profit for the sellers at the expense of Manchester United.” “The bidding is turning into a farce, with Glazers giving no respect to the club,” he added

    04/13/2023, 08:07

    62.5% Shortened!

    A teenager in Indonesia stabbed his elder sibling to death in a fit of rage over a packet of instant noodles

    The incident took place in Lalan district, South Sumatra on April 8 when the 15-year-old bought a packet of instant noodles from a nearby shop to break fast

    Local police said the older sibling was angry when he found out that the teenager, identified with the initial AL, bought only one packet

    The teenager is currently being held at a police station

  • ‘THIS WEEK, NO ONE’: HAZARDOUS THAI POLLUTION DETERS TOURISTS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2023/04/13/this-week-no-one-hazardous-thai-pollution-deters-tourists/64548

    04/13/2023, 08:07

    75.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise CHIANG MAI, April 13 — Hazardous pollution levels in northern Thailand have left the historic city of Chiang Mai choking under thick smog, with locals worried about the impact on tourism — and their health

    This week, no one,” Boontan said

    A shifting global weather pattern and Chiang Mai’s topography trapping pollution conspired to “drive PM 2.5 into the perfect storm this year”, he said

    This year alone, nearly two million people in Thailand have needed hospital treatment for respiratory conditions caused by air pollution, according to the public health ministry

    Chiang Mai cardiologist Rungsrit Kanjanavanit told AFP that officials are not doing enough to tackle the pollution, worried about its impact on the country’s vital tourist economy

    “It makes me wonder if I’ll ever come back here again if there’s still pollution like this.” — AFP

    ['chiang', 'mai', 'pollution', 'health', 'tourist']

  • UMNO’S PUSH TO PARDON NAJIB PUTS PAKATAN IN DANGEROUS WATERS, ANALYSTS SAY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/13/umnos-push-to-pardon-najib-puts-pakatan-in-dangerous-waters-analysts-say/64465

    04/13/2023, 08:07

    82.35% Shortened!

    Anwar has been coy about the matter when pressed by reporters, denying that his role on the Pardons Board evaluating Najib’s application to the Agong would lead to conflict, and saying it was Umno’s prerogative to appeal for the royal pardon that Najib was constitutionally allowed to seek

    “In truth, the pardon for Najib serves as an inflection point for the unity government under Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim

    “The Umno leadership faces potential backlash should it not exhaust all options to free Najib; and at the same time, should it do so, there is a potential backlash to Anwar’s Pakatan Harapan coalition,” Shazwan said

    Shazwan suggested that should Umno succeed in getting Najib pardoned, it could reinforce claims of selective prosecution and undermine Anwar’s reform credentials

    Hassan warned Anwar that his coalition would be punished in the state elections if Najib were to be pardoned and the corruption charges against current Umno president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, dropped

    Still, the Pardons Board decision could go against Najib

    ['umno', 'pardon', 'najib', 'would', 'anwar']

    “In truth, the pardon for Najib serves as an inflection point for the unity government under Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim

    “The Umno leadership faces potential backlash should it not exhaust all options to free Najib; and at the same time, should it do so, there is a potential backlash to Anwar’s Pakatan Harapan coalition,” Shazwan said

    04/13/2023, 08:07

    64.71% Shortened!

    They said the decision could potentially spare the lives of 1,300 prisoners on death row

    “The decision bolsters the global trend towards universal abolition

    The death penalty is incompatible with fundamental tenets of human rights and dignity

    The Malaysian Parliament had passed the Abolition of Mandatory Death Penalty Bill 2023

    “With this decision, Malaysia sends a strong signal supporting the abolition of the death penalty in a region where capital punishment is too often imposed for a broad range of crimes such as drug-related offences,” the experts said

    The UN experts expressed hope that the recent decision to abolish the mandatory death penalty would pave the way for the complete abolition of the death penalty in Malaysia, and eventually in the whole region

    ['right', 'expert', 'decision', 'mandatory', 'death']

    They said the decision could potentially spare the lives of 1,300 prisoners on death row

    “The decision bolsters the global trend towards universal abolition

    The death penalty is incompatible with fundamental tenets of human rights and dignity

    The Malaysian Parliament had passed the Abolition of Mandatory Death Penalty Bill 2023

    “With this decision, Malaysia sends a strong signal supporting the abolition of the death penalty in a region where capital punishment is too often imposed for a broad range of crimes such as drug-related offences,” the experts said

    The UN experts expressed hope that the recent decision to abolish the mandatory death penalty would pave the way for the complete abolition of the death penalty in Malaysia, and eventually in the whole region

    ['right', 'expert', 'decision', 'mandatory', 'death']



  • UNHEALTHY AIR QUALITY IN SEVERAL AREAS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/04/13/unhealthy-air-quality-in-several-areas

    04/13/2023, 07:08

    53.85% Shortened!

    According to the Department of Environment data, the API had fluctuated in Cheras from 114 to 108 from 6pm to 9pm on Tuesday but returned to normal at 10pm that day

    The reading for Cheras was at 89 as at 5pm yesterday

    In Port Dickson, the API reading was at 101, which fell under the unhealthy category, at 8pm on Tuesday but returned to normal an hour later at 97

    However, the API in Seremban, which was normal the whole of Tuesday, took a dip to unhealthy level of 103 at 6am yesterday

    The API index in Seremban was at an unhealthy count of 130 at 5pm yesterday

    Good air quality according to the API falls within 50, 51 to 100 is moderate, 101 to 200 is unhealthy, 201 to 300 is very unhealthy and beyond that is regarded as hazardous.

    ['api', 'unhealthy', 'tuesday', 'normal', 'yesterday']

    This drew significant criticism, with former Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Parliament and Law) Datuk Seri Dr Wan Junaidi Tuanku Jaafar claiming that Umno had no legal standing to submit the appeal on Najib’s behalf on Monday

    But there was a slight tweak against Bayern that took some negotiating

    The school of thought is that City were wary of Bayern's wingers — Leroy Sane in particular — and so Stones dropping vertically allowed Manuel Akanji to split and deal with the ex-City winger in a more timely fashion

    The stability of City's back four was afforded special praise by Guardiola — the mentality to shrug off any setbacks and refocus — and that felt like something new in this competition

    Real Madrid (2022), Liverpool (2018) and Tottenham (2019) were afforded eight goals between them in City's home legs

  • FUAD STEPHENS’ FAMILY SAYS DECLASSIFIED ‘DOUBLE SIX’ REPORT DOESN’T GIVE ANSWERS TO CRASH

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/04/12/fuad-stephens-family-says-declassified-double-six-report-doesnt-give-answers-to-crash/64524

    04/13/2023, 00:06

    75.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KOTA KINABALU, April 12 — The family of Tun Fuad Stephens, one of the victims of the “Double Six” tragedy, said that despite the release of the much-anticipated investigative report into the accident, the true reason for the accident will not be known until the Australian authorities also release their reports

    The three remaining children of Fuad Stephens, the then chief minister on June 6, 1976, said that they were grateful for the declassification of the report, but added it still left some questions unanswered

    “We wrote to the Air Accident Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Transport in June 2020 to ask for a copy of this report and were told that they couldn’t find a copy of the report and, even if they found it, it was classified

    “As a family, we would also like to say that we love Australia

    Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim had last week announced that the government would make public the report on the “Double Six” air crash after 47 years

    The full investigation report dated January 25, 1977 can be found here.

    ['fuad', 'say', 'release', 'report', 'minister']

    About Us Advertise KOTA KINABALU, April 12 — The family of Tun Fuad Stephens, one of the victims of the “Double Six” tragedy, said that despite the release of the much-anticipated investigative report into the accident, the true reason for the accident will not be known until the Australian authorities also release their reports

    The three remaining children of Fuad Stephens, the then chief minister on June 6, 1976, said that they were grateful for the declassification of the report, but added it still left some questions unanswered

    “We wrote to the Air Accident Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Transport in June 2020 to ask for a copy of this report and were told that they couldn’t find a copy of the report and, even if they found it, it was classified

    “As a family, we would also like to say that we love Australia

    Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim had last week announced that the government would make public the report on the “Double Six” air crash after 47 years

    The full investigation report dated January 25, 1977 can be found here.

    ['fuad', 'say', 'release', 'report', 'minister']



  • HOW THE GREAT HOME WORKING EXPERIMENT FELL APART

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/great-home-working-experiment-fell-080000785.html

    84.21% Shortened!

    As he announced a brutal round of layoffs at Facebook’s parent company Meta earlier this year, Zuckerberg suggested that staff did a better job when in the office – at least early in their career

    At Twitter, Elon Musk has largely reversed a policy allowing staff to be fully remote, to the extent that some have been sleeping at the office

    After a few weeks, Twitter said staff would be able to work from home permanently

    Staff at Facebook and Google’s UK offices say that for much of last year they effectively had a free vote on whether to come into work

    The shift has been happening across the tech industry

    Hybrid jobs, which involve a mix of office and home work, have risen from 20pc to 29pc, while office-based roles have climbed from 7.7pc to 9.1pc (the remainder are adverts that do not specify)

    ['work', 'home', 'office', 'say', 'staff']

  • INFLATION DATA WILL SHATTER THE STOCK MARKET CALM, GOLDMAN PARTNER WARNS

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/inflation-data-shatter-stock-market-193035639.html

    64.71% Shortened!

    Most Read from Bloomberg Katie Cotton, Guardian of the Apple Brand for 18 Years, Dies Twitter Company ‘No Longer Exists,’ Is Now Part of Musk’s X Elizabeth Holmes Will Have to Wait Out Her Appeal in Prison Inflation Data Will Shatter the Stock Market Calm, Goldman Partner Warns Tumbling Money Supply Alarms Economists Who Foresaw Inflation Expect the S&P 500 to drop at least 2% should the year-over-year inflation rate come in above the previous reading of 6%, Flood wrote in a note Tuesday

    The uncertainty over its policy path has made CPI data one source of heightened market volatility during the past year

    One of their challenges is that inflation is measured in various ways

    Core inflation is what 22V Research asked its clients about this week in a survey

    Inflation is expected to ease for the ninth straight month

    While the decline is a sign that the Fed’s aggressive monetary tightening may have tamed price pressures somewhat, inflation is still far from the central bank’s 2% goal

    ['bloomberg', 'stock', 'market', 'year', 'inflation']

  • GEN Z AND MILLENNIALS ARE SO BROKE THEY’RE RUINING THEIR PARENTS’ RETIREMENTS

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/gen-z-millennials-broke-ruining-184645218.html

    73.91% Shortened!

    The most common financial hit? Emergency savings

    Overall, about 16% of parents reported significantly putting off hitting other financial milestones in order to prioritize their children’s financial needs

    The financial sacrifices of parents, however, aren't going unnoticed—at least by millennials

    Six out of 10 millennials (ages 27 to 42) feel good about their finances, in part because they had that financial help, according to recent research from Ameriprise Financial

    (And that doesn’t account for the savings boost that some have benefited from by living with their parents.) Yet despite the positives, financial experts generally advise against providing financial aid at the expense of your own security

    “Offering financial assistance can backfire if it puts your own savings, investments, and financial well-being at risk,” said Ted Rossman, Bankrate’s senior industry analyst

    ['parent', 'make', 'financial', 'adult', 'child']

  • IMF WARNS OF GROWING GLOBAL DEBT FUELED BY US, CHINA

    https://www.thesundaily.my/world/imf-warns-of-growing-global-debt-fueled-by-us-china-EP10864437

    04/12/2023, 22:09

    53.85% Shortened!

    “We have in 2023 a situation where public debt is higher than what was expected pre-pandemic,“ he said

    Public debt is also expected to grow more quickly than was predicted before the pre-pandemic, he added

    In the US, government debt as a percentage of economic output -- its debt-to-GDP ratio -- is expected to surpass its pandemic-era peak by 2027, Gaspar said

    China, meanwhile, is expected to see its debt-to-GDP ratio rise every year

    Its debt burden is forecast to be almost double its pre-pandemic levels by 2028, according to the IMF

    In response to rising global debt, the IMF is making the “strong case for fiscal tightening,“ he said

    ['debt', 'pandemic', 'imf', 'china', 'expect']
